name: Aurora (itch) (SunshineQueen, bonjourcyn, Yelhsa, Curtis Turpin)
description:
Controls:
Movement - WASD / ArrowKeys
Interact - E
(Push / Pull, Pick up, Talk / Read)

A weary traveler has been roaming for a long, long time. At last, they are ready to find a safe space to settle down and rest. They find what they believe to be the perfect spot...in theory. The only problem? Though the environment has a pleasant exterior, it has actually been corrupted due to years of exploitation. The townsfolk are suffering, losing hope that anything could ever change, feeling trapped and helpless in their situations. Can the traveler help to restore this land’s original spark? And, how much are they willing to give to achieve that goal?

Explore and meet fellow townsfolk in this top down puzzle game. Work your way through levels to restore the Spark they've lost.
